author: gcolvin
content:
EIP-1057 PR for review ahead of All Core Devs call.  Incorporates Andrea Lanfranchi's implementation of the Kik exploit fix.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2894

The reference implementation is on @ifdefelse's repo at
https://github.com/ifdefelse/ProgPOW

The Magician's thread is at
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-progpow-a-programmatic-proof-of-work/272
